description:
Now half price! Seismograph uses the device´s built-in accelerometer to record movement impacts in three axes. The axis whose data is drawn on the rolling scale are selectable. You can set the amplitude (sensitivity), a high-pass filter to filter sensor noise and the number of displayed records. Additionally there are functions to record movement data, compare and export graphs for analysis.
This Professional version of Seismograph includes the following additional features:
No ads - Numeric Input of Graph Range (amplitude) - Absolute Acceleration Measurement - Unlimited Graph Exports - Custom Graph Offset - Analysis Table for basic real time Analysis (inlcuding Shake Counter and Vibration Frequency) - Fully customizable Alarm (observe movement and device´s bearing)
Besides entertainment this tool is handy for professional use, like developers and engineers.
